name: Monument Cowboy
description:
Story

We are a Smuggler of Sculptures in a Western Universe 

Controls

W, A, S, D and space for movement

Left Mouse Click to shoot. 

How to Play

W, A, S, D and space for movement

Left Mouse Click to shoot. 

Goals

Collect the Sculptures and reach at the 100 point

Credits

All the used assets are from epic store marketplace. 

Gameplay Video
